name: Name
newProjectDescription: Create a project which you can later add new droplets in.
newDockDescription: Launch a dock. Fill out a few details, pick a theme, and deploy your web app!
dockDescription: What is your dock all about?
settingsPageDescription: Here you can adjust your account settings.
profilePageDescription: Overview of your settings, support, security and everything else.
generalPageDescription: Adjust or change anything in your account.
contactDetailsPageDescription: Fill in the blanks and make your information up to date.
languagePageDescription: 你好, Привет, Hola, Hello, go with what suits you the best.
marketingPageDescription: Decide how you'd like to receive marketing from us.
verifiedEmailsPageDescription: Verify your email to activate more features.
chatBotPageDescription: Our AI is always learning how to serve you better.
chatPageDescription: Chat with our agents for any question you may have.
securityAndPrivacyPageDescription: Decide how you want to share your data.
supportPageDescription: Feel free to reach out to us for any questions.
generalSupportPageDescription: Call us or send us an email for any help you need.
termsOfServicePageDescription: Our terms for how you use Sailsdock.
deleteAccountPageDescription: We hope you'll give us another chance in the future.
deletionDescription: Please feel free to give us a feedback about what we couldn't deliver on.
verifyEmailPageDescription: Start using Sailsdock and all its features right away.
deploymentProcessPageDescription: Choose a deployment process for your dock.
easyDeploymentDesc: Easy deployment comes with default settings for your project, and builds your app production ready.
advancedDeploymentDesc: Control the setup configuration with more advanced options for your project.
youDontHaveAnyDeploymentConfigurations: You do not have any saved deployment configurations. You can save one by using Touch and Go.
autoDeploymentPageDescription: Fill in the details and deploy, simple as that.
storyblokShortDescription: Storyblok allows you to manage and edit content visually. Drag sections on pages and change the design layout with their super easy visual preview editor.
noCmsDescription: If you don't want any content management system for your app, we assume you're a developer and know what you're doing.
cmsPageDescription: Content management systems saves you time and money on editing design and publishing content.
addDockAppInformationPageDescription: Name your web app something brilliant, and add a informative description for it.
title: Title
webappModel: Choose a model for your dock
modelPageDescription: Add the type of business model for your Web Application.
frameworkPageDescription: You can create droplet with live site which is built by selected framework.
defaultProjectDescription: Resources created without a designated project will be added to your default.
deleteProjectDescription: To delete a project, you must move or delete all resources within it. Default Project cannot be deleted.
cutAndRunDeploymentDesc: Hasty deployment by uploading your app in a zip file. Sailsdock will unzip, build, and run your project with secure SSL.
gitAndPushDeploymentDesc: Explore the github universe by testing out any JAMstack repository of your choice with secure SSL. Just find a repository and deploy.
handOverFistDeploymentDesc: Deploy quickly, continuously and choose between several stacks for your exact business goals. It's one-click done smooth.
touchAndgoDeploymentDesc: For the dev connoisseur with more advanced preferences for deployment. Save your configurations for all future deployments.
supportOnlyForZip: This dropzone supports only ZIP files
requiredGitUri: Github URI is required for deployment
notCompatibleWithThisDeploymentProcess: Not compatible with this deployment process.
repositoryIsNotLabeledAsJavascript: Is this wrong? Get in touch with us and we will fix it.
fileIsUploadedAndReadyToGo: File is uploaded and ready for deployment
